A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly written\, with plots you could fly a Star Destroyer through\, no character development\, and silly plots that pad the run time but add nothing to the story. Things happen because...plot. Things happen because the writer/director needed them to happen\, such a Leia Poppins\, the wasting of Laura Dern\, Captain Phasma getting the Boba Fett treatment\, and the gutting of Luke Skywalker to shine a light on the greatness of Rey\,the reigning Mary Sue. One had to wonder if the sequel will be called Return of the Mary Sues.
